actions.text: Amendment SA 426 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 426 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 101.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 426.
Amendment SA 426 proposed by Senator Bayh. To express the sense of the Senate on low income programs and the income tax on certain Social Security benefits.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 426 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 101.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 426 proposed by Senator Bayh.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate on low income programs and the income tax on certain Social Security benefits.
